string: DIY HARLEY QUINN COSTUME - SUICIDE SQUAD - MARGOT ROBBIE

array.text: You will need a plain white long-sleeve shirt
For her glove we took a regular driving glove from the thrift store
for her hair we'll be using a light blonde wig tied into two pigtails we're using this blonde movie
For her bat we're using this plain woodenbaseballbat
To make Harley's shorts start with a pair of well fitting shorts that we'll be using as our template this is way easier than describing measurements as
For the makeup we're starting with this white creme face paint and spending it all over the
